title: Ogres Do Disco
description: It's a disco inferno as Ogden the ogre has to catch a terrifying monsterWhat do you give a dancing ogre with great big feet? Lots of space! Ogden loves to dance to the funky beat, and the disco ball is coming up. But there's a fiendish creature on the loose who wants to put a jam in everyone's plans. Ogden better not get too ogre-eager if he wants to catch the monster.
author: Kirsty McKay
